itemInfo.itemDesc: A necklace decorated with a Ruby.

item.name: Rough Ruby
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing. Rough Ruby requires a certain level of skill to collect.\n- How to Obtain: It can be directly obtained from rock containing Gemstones.

item.name: Silver Ore
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing. Silver Ore requires a certain level of skill to collect.\n- How to Obtain: It can be directly obtained from rock containing Silver.

item.name: Resplendent Ruby Necklace
item.desc: A necklace decorated with a Resplendent Ruby.
